/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars and taxis are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly red, green, and gray, reflecting the diverse elements of the cityscape.
